name: 陳文章
objective: 本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
schedule:
1.熱傳導(Heat Transfer by Conduction)
2.熱流原理(Principles of Heat Flow in Fluids)
3.無相變化熱對流(Heat Transfer to Fluids Without Phase Change)
4.兩相變化熱對流-沸騰與凝結(Heat Transfer to Fluids With Phase Change)
5.熱交換裝置(Heat Exchange Equipment)
6.輻射熱傳(Radiation Heat Transfer)
7.蒸發(Evaporation)
materials:
1. McCabe, W. L., Smith, J. C. & Harriott, P., “Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering”, 7th edition, 2005, 東華書局
2.輸送現象與單元操作：含分離程序原理，2006年，羅文偉，全威圖書公司
